tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robotic_surgical_systems_performance_data (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    surgery_date DATE,
    surgical_time TIME,
    complications TEXT,
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE robotic_surgical_systems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE,
    warranty_expiry DATE
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT,
    operation_date DATE,
    operation_time TIME,
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(50),
    procedure_type VARCHAR(50),
    success_rate FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES robotic_surgical_systems(system_id)
);

CREATE TABLE surgical_systems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR,
    manufacturer VARCHAR,
    purchase_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE surgical_operations (
    operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_date DATE,
    operation_type VARCHAR,
    surgeon_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (surgeon_id) REFERENCES surgeons(surgeon_id)
);

CREATE TABLE robotic_systems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE surgical_procedures (
    procedure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    duration_minutes INT,
    success_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    value DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    technician_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE robotic_surgery_performance (
    serial_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    surgical_procedure VARCHAR(100),
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(50),
    surgery_date DATE,
    average_performance_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE surgical_instruments (
    instrument_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    instrument_type VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE surgery_schedule (
    surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    surgical_procedure VARCHAR(100),
    surgery_date DATE,
    team_id INT,
    instrument_id INT
);
